p: Notwithstanding its relatively low mortality, epidemics of HAV can be prolonged and can result in substantial economic loss. 1 HAV vaccination was added to the National Immunization Program in 2015. Considering that young adults account for majority of the labour force in Korea and that HAV can cause outbreaks in communities with weak herd immunity, vaccination of young adults is of a great importance in workplace settings. However, vaccination coverage against HAV in Korea is low, and immunity may vary depending on personal and occupational factors.
